negotiator.session

Class TournamentManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • negotiator.session.TournamentManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class TournamentManager
extends java.lang.Thread
    Manages a multi-lateral tournament and makes sure that the SessionManager are instantiated. It uses the configuration object which is created by the user interface and extracts individual session from configuration object which it wil pass on to the session manager.

    Agents in a tournament must be of class NegotiationParty.

    • Constructor Detail

      • TournamentManager

        public TournamentManager(MultilateralTournamentConfiguration config)
        Initializes a new instance of the TournamentManager class. The tournament manager uses the provided configuration to find which sessions to run and how many collections of these sessions (tournaments) to run.
        Parameters:
        config - The configuration to use for this Tournament

      • runSingleSession

        public java.lang.Exception runSingleSession(java.util.List<NegotiationPartyInternal> parties,
                                   ExecutorWithTimeout executor)
        Run a single session for the given parties (protocol and session are also used, but extracted from the tournament manager's configuration
        Parameters:
        parties - the parties to run the tournament for. Must contain at least 1 party. All parties must not be null.
        Returns:
        If all goes ok, returns null. Else, Exception that occured during execution.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if some of the required data could not be extracted

        Throws:
